description:
Tasuke`s class is performing "Cinderella" for the school play. Everyone`s idol, Sakura-san, is playing Cinderella, and purely by accident, Tasuke volunteers to play the prince! Tasuke has a habit of passing gas when he`s nervous, so he`s worried that he`ll ruin the play if it happens during the big proposal scene at the end.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 主役!? たーすけくん
